Code: EXEC SQL SELECT T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, T1.OCORHIST, T1.OPERACAO, (T1.VAL_OPERACAO * T4.NUM_FATOR), T2.CHQINT, T2.NUMERO_SIVAT, T2.DV_SIVAT, T2.DATA_SIVAT, T2.AGE_CENTRAL_PROD01, T6.NOME_RAZAO, T3.CODPRODU FROM SEGUROS.VG_DPS_PROPOSTA_HIST-PGOP-SIVAT WHERE T2.CHQINT = :CHQINT AND T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = T3.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND T3.NUM_APOLICE = T5.NUM_APOLICE AND T5.CODCLIEN = T6.COD_CLIENTE AND T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = T2.NUMDOC_NUM01 AND T1.OCORHIST = T2.OCORHIST AND T4.IDE_SISTEMA = 'SI' AND T4.COD_FUNCAO IN (2, 5, 6, 21, 22, 20, 8, 12, 15, 16, 25) AND T4.IDE_SISTEMA = T4.IDE_SISTEMA_OPER AND T1.OPERACAO = T4.COD_OPERACAO ORDER BY T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, T2.NUMERO_SIVAT END SQL
